headlines.description: Carlos Correa homered twice and drove in four, Jose Altuve hit a go-ahead, two-run single during Houston's four-run sixth inning and the Astros rallied to beat the Oakland Athletics 10-5 in the opener of their AL Division series Monday at Dodger Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Springer, Correa rally Astros past A's 10-5 in ALDS opener

events.name: New York Yankees at Tampa Bay Rays

headlines.description: Giancarlo Stanton hit a grand slam in the ninth inning for New York's fourth home run of the game, and the Yankees beat the Tampa Bay Rays 9-3 Monday night in the opener of their AL Division Series at Petco Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stanton, Yankees power way to 9-3 win against Rays in opener
